name: Sorted hashes
description:
Complete the solution so that it sorts an array of hashes passed in by the hash key specified. 

The specified key will always be present in every elements of the array, so you do not need to worry about invalid cases.

The sort should be [stable](https://simple.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stable_sorting_algorithm).

## Example: 

```ruby
solution([{'a' => 2}, {'a' => 1}], 'a')
# => [{'a' => 1}, {'a' => 2}]]

solution([{a: 1}, {a: 5}, {a: 3}], :a)
# => [{a:1}, {a: 3}, {a: 5}]

```
